title: Development for residential purpose to the extent of maximum 30% of the permissible FSI as per provisions of Regulation No
clause_text: Development for residential purpose to the extent of maximum 30% of the permissible FSI as per provisions of Regulation No.30 (A) 1, Table No 12 may be allowed. Additional FSI as per this regulation shall not be permissible for residential user/development.
section: 33(18) Development of Multi Storey Public Parking Lots (PPL):
